source.value: Electronic reproduction of (manifestation): Hawley, W. A. (Walter Augustus), 1863-1920. -- Oriental rugs, antique and modern, by Walter A. Hawley. With eleven full-page plates in colour, eighty half-tone engravings and four maps. -- New York, Dodd, Mead, 1922 [c1913]. -- xi, 320 p. fold. col. front., illus., plates (part col., 1 fold.) maps, charts. 30 cm. -- Call number of original: NK2808 H38 1922

relation.value: Mary Ann Beinecke Decorative Art Collection

description.value: Introduction. -- Physical features and history of rug-producing lands. -- Materials. -- Dyeing. -- Weaving. -- Designs and symbols. -- Rug weaving before the Eighteenth Century. -- Classification of modern rugs. -- Persian rugs. -- Asia Minor rugs. -- Caucasian rugs. -- Central Asiatic rugs. -- Indian rugs. -- Chinese rugs. -- Kilims. -- How to distinguish rugs. -- Purchasing rugs. -- Index
